name: npm-app
description: This is a starter template used by Tej for web projects.
author: Tej Kahlon <tejpartapsingh91@gmail.com>

scripts.copy: mkdirp dist/vendor/js -p && mkdirp dist/vendor/css -p && npm run vendor_css && npm run vendor_js
scripts.styles: npm run lint-scss && npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.uglify: mkdirp dist/js -p && uglifyjs app/js/custom.js -m -o dist/js/custom.js && uglifyjs app/js/custom.js -m -c -o dist/js/custom.min.js
scripts.scripts: npm run lint && npm run uglify
scripts.icons: svgo -f app/images/icons -o dist/images/icons && svg-sprite-generate -d app/images/icons -o dist/images/sprite.svg
scripts.images: imagemin --plugin=pngquant app/images/* -o dist/images && npm run icons
scripts.html: pug --pretty app/pug/pages/*.pug -o dist && npm run favicon-html
scripts.serve: browser-sync start --server --serveStatic dist --files "dist/css/*.css, dist/js/*.js, **/*.html, app/pug/pages/*.pug, dist/images/*.*, !node_modules"
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run styles && npm run scripts && npm run images && npm run fonts && npm run html && npm run favicon-generate && npm run gulp && npm run watch:all
scripts.watch:all: npm-run-all -p serve watch:css watch:js watch:html watch:images
